Uses of Package
org.efaps.admin.event

  • Packages that use org.efaps.admin.event 
    Package Description
    org.efaps.admin
    All classes related to admininistration of the kernel.
    org.efaps.admin.datamodel
    DataModel Handling is doen with this classes.
    org.efaps.admin.datamodel.ui
    This package contains classes responsable for the representation of types in an Userinterface.
    org.efaps.admin.event
    The classes for loading, executing the events in eFaps.
    org.efaps.db
    This package contains all classes related to the eFaps-DataBase.
    org.efaps.update.event
    TODO description!
  • Classes in org.efaps.admin.event used by org.efaps.admin 
    Class and Description
    EventDefinition
    In this Class a Event can be defined.
    EventType
    This enumeration provides the key-value Relation for the TriggerEvent.
    Therefore using a trigger can be made by using the key.
    Parameter
    Class witch is used for parsing Parameters to the Events.
    Return
    Class witch is used for getting the Return of the Events.
  • Classes in org.efaps.admin.event used by org.efaps.admin.datamodel 
    Class and Description
    EventDefinition
    In this Class a Event can be defined.
    EventType

    Therefore using a trigger can be made by using the key.

  • Classes in org.efaps.admin.event used by org.efaps.admin.event 
    Class and Description
    EventExecution
    This interface is for the Programs loaded dynamically from the eFaps database with the eFaps class loader.
    EventType
    This enumeration provides the key-value Relation for the TriggerEvent.
    Therefore using a trigger can be made by using the key.
    Parameter
    Class witch is used for parsing Parameters to the Events.
    Parameter.ParameterValues
    This enum holds the definitions of Parameters, to be accessed.
    Return
    Class witch is used for getting the Return of the Events.
    Return.ReturnValues
    Enumeration for the kind of returned values.
